GK16visah__u:6669: āḥ śaityaṃ tuhinācalasya karayorityūcivān sasmitaṃ śailāntaḥ puramātṛmaṇḍalagaṇairdṛṣṭo 'vatādvaḥ śivaḥ” //
GK16visah__u:6675: “lāṅgūlenābhihatya kṣititalamasakṛddārayannagrapadbhyā- mātmanyevāvalīya drutamatha gaganaṃ protpatan vikrameṇa /
GK16visah__u:6676: sphūrjaddhuṅkāradhoṣaḥ pratidiśamakhilān drāvayanneṣa jantūna kopāviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prativanamaruṇocchūnacakṣūstarakṣuḥ”
GK16visah__u:6685: na cāyaṃ prasādākhyo guṇaḥ, bhūtabhāvinoḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇatve tasyāhetutvāt
GK16visah__u:6686: na cādbhuto rasaḥ, vismayaṃ pratyasya hetutvāt /
GK16visah__u:6689: na ca svabhāvoktiḥ, tasya laukikavastugatasūkṣmadharmasvabhāvasyaiva yathāvadvarṇanaṃ svarūpam; asya tu vastunaḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇasvarūpo vicchittiviśeṣo 'stīti /
GK16visah__u:6690: yadi punarvastunaḥ kvacitsvabhāvoktāvapyasyā vicchitteḥ sambhavastadobhayoḥ saṅkaraḥ /
GK16visah__u:6693: atra pratyakṣāyamāṇasyaiva varṇanānnāyamalaṅkāraḥ, varṇanāvaśena pratyakṣāyamāṇatvasyaiva svarūpatvāt /
GK16visah__u:6694: yatpunarapratyakṣāyamāṇasyāpi varṇane pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ tatrāyamalaṅkāro bhavituṃ yuktaḥ, yathodāhṛte “āsīdañjanam'--ityādau /
GK16visah__u:6696: yadvāpi prastutasyāṅgaṃ mahatāṃ caritaṃ bhavet // VisSd_10.94 //
GK16visah__u:6724: dadṛśe tava vairiṇāṃ madaḥ sa gataḥ kvāpi tavekṣaṇe kṣaṇāt” //
GK16visah__u:6726: bhāvasya codaye saṃdhau miśratve ta tadākhyakāḥ // VisSd_10.96 //
GK16visah__u:6729: śrutvā kuto 'pi tvannama lebhire viṣamāṃ daśām” //
GK16visah__u:6732: salajjā cāntike sakhyāḥ pātu naḥ pārvatī sadā” //
GK16visah__u:6734: “paśyetkaściccala capala ! re ! kā tvārahaṃ kumārī hastālambaṃ vitara hahahā vyutkramaḥ kvāsi yāsi /
GK16visah__u:6739: evālaṅkārāḥ, rasādayastu vācyavācakābhyāmupakāryā eveti na teṣāmaṅkāratā bhavituṃ yuktā” iti /
GK16visah__u:6751: yadi ca rasādyupakāramātreṇālaṅkṛtitvaṃ tadā vācakadiṣvapi tathā prasajyeta /
GK16visah__u:6752: evaṃ ca yacca kaiściduktam--”rasādīnāmaṅgitve rasavadādyalaṅkāraḥ, aṅgatve tu dvitīyodāttālaṅkāraḥ” iti tadapi parāstam /
GK16visah__u:6755: yathā laukikālaṅkārāṇāmapi parasparamiśraṇe pṛthakcārutvena pṛthagalaṅkāratvaṃ tathoktarūpāṇāṃ kāvyālaṅkārāṇāmapi parasparamiśratve saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkārākhyau pṛthagalaṅkārau /
GK16visah__u:6762: atra pāyādapāyāditi yamakam, saṃsāretyādau cānuprāsa iti śabdālaṅkārayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ /
GK16visah__u:6763: dvitīye pāde upamā, dvitīyārdhe ca rūpakamityarthālaṅkārayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ /
GK16visah__u:6766: saṃdigdhatve ca bhavati saṅkarastrividhaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_10.98 //
GK16visah__u:6771: sā ca mandā kinyā vastuvṛttena yatpādamūlaveṣṭanaṃ taccaraṇamūlaveṣṭanamiti śleṣamutthāpayatīti tasyāṅgam /
GK16visah__u:6782: atra kiṃ mukhasya candratayādhvasānādatiśayoktiḥ, uta idamiti mukhaṃ
GK16visah__u:6783: nirdiśya candratvāropādrūpakam, athavā idamiti mukhasya candramaṇḍalasya ca dvayorapi prakṛtayorekadharmābhisaṃbandhāttulyayogitā,
GK16visah__u:6785: mukhasya gamyatvātsamāsoktiḥ, yadvāprastutacandravarṇanayā prastutasya mukhasyāvagatirityaprastutapraśaṃsā, yadvā manmathoddīpanaḥ kālaḥ
GK16visah__u:6786: svakāryabhūtacandravarṇanāmukhena vaṇita iti paryāyoktiriti bahūnāmalaṅkarāṇāṃ saṃdehātsaṃdehasaṅkaraḥ
GK16visah__u:6787: yathā vā--”mukhacandraṃ paśyāmi” ityatra kiṃ mukhaṃ candra iva ityupamā ?
GK16visah__u:6794: “mukhacandraḥ prakāśate” ityatra prakāśākhyo dharmo rūpakasya sādhako mukhe upacaritatvena saṃbhavatīti nopamābādhakaḥ /
GK16visah__u:6796: atra yoṣita āliṅganaṃ nāyakasya sādṛśye nocitamiti lakṣmyāliṅganasya
GK16visah__u:6800: atra vadane locanasya sambhavādupamāyāḥ sādhakatā, ambuje cāsaṃbhavādrūpakasya bādhakatā /
GK16visah__u:6806: “kaṭākṣeṇāpīṣatkṣaṇamapi nirīkṣeta yadi sā tadānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati
GK16visah__u:6814: yathā vā--”kurabakāravakāraṇatāṃ yayuḥ” ityatra rabakā ravakā ityekaṃ bakāravakāra ityekamiti yamakayoḥ /
GK16visah__u:6821: sāhityadarpaṇamamuṃ sudhiyo vilokya sāhityatattvamakhilaṃ sukhameva vitta
GK16visah__u:6823: tāvanmanaḥ saṃmadayan kavīnāmeṣa prabandhaḥ prathito 'stu loke //
